title: Integrate Payload on Satellite
description: Engineers in a cleanroom must integrate a high-resolution camera payload onto a satellite bus.

tasks.description: Follow the integration procedure document to mechanically and electrically connect the payload to the satellite bus.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent follows the checklist and completes all connections.

tasks.description: Run a series of functional tests to verify that the payload is receiving power and can communicate with the bus.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent runs the tests and confirms all communications are nominal.

tasks.description: Document the completion of the integration and testing steps in the satellite's assembly log.
tasks.expected_outcome: Agent accurately updates the assembly log.
